price: 42. quant à Mes serviteurs, tu n’auras aucune autorité sur eux, hormis ceux qui t’auront suivi en égarés.
arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٌ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَاوِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna ʿibādī laysa laka ʿalayhim sul'ṭānun illā mani ittabaʿaka mina al-ghāwīna
